group_1.narration: "It's alright... Our last six months together weren't in vain... @And now I'll live on within you..."
"Just remember... Whenever you need help, @I'll be right there with you... Alright...?"
Don't hate, don't be jealous, @and don't be selfish. Always work hard for others, @and pray for peace, both of the world and of yourself.
I still try to live by those words, Senpai...

group_1.textCenter: The paperwork is done. Is there anything else @you need from me?

group_1.textRight: No, that's everything, thank you.
Oh?

group_1.textLeft: Is something wrong?

group_1.textRight: No, I just noticed you rejected the budget request @from the baseball club...

group_1.textLeft: I had to.
I cannot approve something that doesn't fit the @theme of the school festival.
"The nail that sticks out will get hammered down."
Even if that nail has good intentions.

group_1.textRight: Good point.
Okay, I'll let them know.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you. Now I need to get going.

group_1.textRight: You've been leaving earlier than usual lately.

group_1.textLeft: I'm rather busy outside of school these days.

group_1.textCenter: Apologies if I made you all wait.
There's a big event coming up at school.

group_1.textRight: You don't have to apologize.
We know how busy you are.
Besides, you're the leader of Torayamachi, @one of the biggest gangs in Futatsugi City.
Nobody will blame you if you throw @your weight around a bit.

group_1.textLeft: I don't want to become that kind of arrogant leader.

group_1.textRight: Would you like something to drink before we start @the debriefing?

group_1.textLeft: No thanks. Let's hear your report.
Sakuya, you look like you want to say something.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I wanted to tell everyone...
Witches are back in town.

group_1.textCenter: Are you sure it wasn't just a one-off...?

group_1.textLeft: They're really scarce, @but finding one isn't unheard of...

group_1.textRight: Does this answer your question?

group_1.textLeft: Even though it's almost impossible to find @a single one...

group_1.textRight: Right? You see what I mean?
This proves that Witches have finally come back!

group_1.textLeft: I wouldn't go that far. @You could have simply gotten lucky.

group_1.textRight: Yuna...

group_1.textLeft: That said, I am still happy to hear the news.

group_1.textRight: I thought you would be!

group_1.textLeft: Though I would be happier if the girl we sent out @came back...

group_1.textRight: We haven't heard from her since we sent her after @that Witch...

group_1.textLeft: We don't have anyone else who can afford to @take off for days like that...
So we can't really send anyone else away...

group_1.textRight: Witches vanishing, and Witches returning...
Ryuugasaki won't listen to us @unless we can prove both.
And if we can't convince them, nothing will stop @them from declaring war on us.
Whichever side wins will absorb the other one...

group_1.textLeft: No...
Right now, both sides are evenly matched.
We should have time to look into this @before the balance shifts.
[chara:102102:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: *Wheeze* *Pant*

group_1.textLeft: ...What happened?

group_1.textRight: I-it's...

group_1.textLeft: Is it about Ryuugasaki?

group_1.textRight: Well, sort of...

group_1.textLeft: Out with it, then.

group_1.textRight: Ryuugasaki knows that we lost the Horse...!

group_1.textLeft: Whaâ€“?!
...I can't believe this.

group_1.textRight: You don't think...one of us told them?

group_1.textLeft: Nobody else knew about the Horse,
and I wouldn't be surprised if they slipped @a spy into our ranks.

group_1.textRight: Yuna...

group_1.textLeft: Well, I'm not concerned with who the culprit is @right now.
But...the scales are starting to tip...
We cannot let Ryuugasaki take advantage of this.
Let everyone know that Witches are back.
